    ALBERTO CAMERLENGO, CEO OF FURLA GROUP

    The fiscal year of 2018 was an important year for Furla, the Italian luxury leather brand. Furla took over full control of the distribution networks in mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau and Singapore. Furla also invested heavily in supply chain optimization…
